reviewtext: Used the Koss Porta Pro for the last 18 months and was pleased until the wires frayed. Looking for a replacement I came across the Panasonic RP-HT21 and figured for $5 how can I lose. They're OK - non-flexible headphones sit funny so I had to turn them around to use. Uncomfortable after wearing for more then an hour. Like the title says - spend $5 and you get $5 worth of headphones.
